meanings.definition: The phenomenon of having different spatial arrangements of atoms in molecules that are not mirror images of each other.
meanings.sent1: Understanding diastereoisomerisms is crucial in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: The complexity of diastereoisomerisms can be challenging to grasp.
